translation.en: [male voice whispers] Good luck, baby Willa.
translation.zh: ‎祝你好运 薇拉宝贝 ‎（薇柳沃德所属）

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -[wind blows]
[man] Chili-chili-chila! Willi-willi-Willa!
translation.zh: ‎墨西哥辣肉酱 薇拉就想要这样

translation.en: Birthday chili brewed to perfection! [man mimics echo] Ection, ection…
translation.zh: ‎精心烹制的极品生日辣肉酱

translation.en: I'm so proud my birthday girl
translation.zh: ‎我太自豪了 我的寿星女儿

translation.en: ordered her dad's special chili for her birthday dinner.
translation.zh: ‎生日点名要吃爸爸的招牌辣肉酱

translation.en: -Wouldn't be my birthday without it. -Oh.
Now, I know you wanted a phone, but I think…
translation.zh: ‎对了 我知道你想要手机 ‎但我觉得

translation.en: you're going to like this even more.
Come on, open it!
Whoa. "Property of Willow Ward."
-[soft music plays] -[dad] It was your mom's.
She wanted you to have it when you were old enough to know what to do with it.
translation.zh: ‎她让我在你能用上它时把它交给你

translation.en: [inhales] Now I'm no fashion expert, but I figured 12 years old,
translation.zh: ‎我不是时尚专家 但你都12岁了

translation.en: you're old enough to know how to wear a necklace.
She used to pull my leg and tell me it was magic.
translation.zh:
‎她以前会跟我开玩笑说
‎这是一条魔法项链

translation.en: Your mom would always say,
"Believe in magic and life will be magical."
translation.zh: ‎“只要你相信魔法 ‎人生就会变得奇妙”

translation.en: -Can you help me put it on? -Yeah.
[takes deep breath] So, how do I look?
As beautiful as your mom,
and she was the most beautiful woman in the world.
Thank you for trusting me with this, Dad. I'll wear it forever.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你信任我 爸爸 ‎我会永远戴着它的

translation.en: Happy birthday, sweetheart.
Chili.
Chili. [laughs]
[dad] Okay, birthday girl,
translation.zh: ‎好了 小寿星 你可要准备好了

translation.en: you better put on a jacket because this stuff is chili.
translation.zh: ‎好了 小寿星 你可要准备好了 ‎我煮了“辣”么多哦

translation.en: It couldn't be. After all this time.
Looks like they didn't leave it with great-uncle William.
translation.zh: ‎看来这也没有留给曾叔父威廉

translation.en: Scratch another loser off the list.
translation.zh: ‎从名单上再划掉一个没用的

translation.en: Twelve years of searching and another dead end.
We'll never find it in time.
I don't know, Wilma.
Maybe if you chipped in and did a little digging, we might just find it, okay?
translation.zh: ‎要是你搭把手帮着挖 ‎说不定我们能找到呢 好吗？

translation.en: Oh yeah. Huh, that's a huge help.
translation.zh: ‎哦 你这可真是帮了大忙

translation.en: Oh. Wait, wait, wait.
Was that…?
Could it be?
I think it was.
-[crow] It is! It's back in Winding Way. -[gasps]
I nearly blew off my perch. The amulet has resurfaced and you'll never guess where.
translation.zh: ‎我震惊得差点摔下来 ‎护身符又出现了 ‎你绝对猜不到它在哪儿

translation.en: Does this mean we can stop digging?
translation.zh: ‎这意味着我们可以不再挖了吗？

translation.en: Don't count your eyeballs before they blink, Sneak,
translation.zh: ‎你先别高兴得太早 斯匿克

translation.en: but, as they say, maybe.
translation.zh: ‎不过就像它说的 是有可能的哦

translation.en: You found the amulet?
Hey, what are you doing? Stop.
Uh-oh. Let's get out of here.
-[dramatic music plays] -So long, mortal.
I still can't believe it was under our noses this whole time.
translation.zh:
‎我还是不敢相信
‎它一直就在我们眼皮底下

translation.en: Right there.
Like, right there, in Willow's very house.
-Bright side… -Hm?
translation.zh: ‎往好的一面想 至少我们找到了

translation.en: -At least we found it. -Oh, is that the bright side?
translation.zh: ‎往好的一面想 至少我们找到了 ‎那是好的一面吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Is it? Because we wasted, I don't know,
translation.zh: ‎我们可是浪费了 我想想

translation.en: over ten years of our lives looking for it, so…
[inhales] It's fine.
Sticky-Paws Fink,
tomorrow you do what you do best.
Whatever you need, boss. Fink will not let you down.
translation.zh: ‎听你的吩咐 老大 ‎芬克不会让你失望的

translation.en: And finally…
the amulet will be ours.
Alright, let's go in.
[caws] I guess I'll just stay out here.
-Oh, hey, let's get this party started. -[laughs]
Sorry I'm late,
but coordinating for a slumber party requires a lot of planning.
translation.zh: ‎协调睡衣派对需要很多计划安排

translation.en: Scout, you're not late. You're 30 seconds early.
translation.zh: ‎丝考特 你没迟到 你早来了30秒

translation.en: Whew. You know I detest lateness.
-[laughs] -Oh.
Lucy!
Let the Willa Ward birthday bonanza begin!
translation.zh: ‎让我们开始薇拉沃德的生日狂欢吧！

translation.en: -[laughs] -I couldn't find my bike anywhere. -I had to use my little brother's. -[laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我到处都找不到我的自行车
‎所以只好用我弟弟的

translation.en: Look Mr. Ward, can we cut to the chase?
translation.zh: ‎沃德叔叔 我们直接进入正题吧？

translation.en: Everyone knows in your line of business, your loot bags are the best.
translation.zh: ‎大家都知道干你这行的 ‎最会准备派对礼包了

translation.en: It'd be amazing if we could break tradition
and get into them a little early.
Oh Scout, you know flattery gets me every time.
translation.zh: ‎哦 丝考特 ‎你知道我最吃拍马屁这一套了

translation.en: Hey, I didn't get into the candy business for nothing, huh?
translation.zh: ‎喂 我的糖果店可不是白开的

translation.en: -Let's go get some loot! Ha ha! -[cheering]
translation.zh:
‎我们去拿派对礼包吧！ ‎-太棒了！
‎-快过来！

translation.en: -Dad, I think they know. -Come on, Willa.
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸 大家知道我过生日啦
‎-不 我就要举着

translation.en: -Ugh, fine. [groans] -Don't wanna waste it.
This is the best candy ever.
Your dad slays it with the loot bags.
translation.zh: ‎你爸爸的派对礼包真是绝了

translation.en: Hey, girls. You sure you want to sleep up in the attic tonight?
translation.zh: ‎姑娘们 你们确定今晚要睡阁楼吗？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad. It's way more fun to tell ghost stories up here.
translation.zh: ‎确定 爸爸 ‎在这里讲鬼故事要有趣得多

translation.en: Okay. Well nothing too spooky, okay? And lights out by midnight.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你们别弄得太吓人了 好吗？ ‎午夜前熄灯

translation.en: Love you.
Love you, Dad.
Ready?
It was hers.
My dad wanted to wait until I was old enough so I could take good care of it.
translation.zh:
‎我爸爸说我能好好保管它了
‎所以交给了我

translation.en: [Scout] Your mom had amazing taste.
-That is so vintage. -[laughing]
You never really talk about her.
translation.zh: ‎你从来没怎么说过你妈妈的事

translation.en: I don't know much about her.
I would like to know more, but…
translation.zh: ‎我想知道更多 但我怕我爸爸伤心

translation.en: I'm worried it makes Dad sad if I'm always asking questions.
translation.zh: ‎我想知道更多 但我怕我爸爸伤心 ‎如果我一直不停问问题的话

translation.en: Besides, it feels like she's right here with us anyway.
translation.zh: ‎再说了 ‎我感觉她现在就在我们身边呢

translation.en: What's taking him so long?
Never send a rat to do a cat's job.
translation.zh: ‎千万不要让老鼠去做猫的工作

translation.en: He's probably messing up as we speak.
Come on.
Since Halloween is coming, this one is all about
translation.zh: ‎既然万圣节要来了 ‎那我来讲讲蜿蜒路镇三女巫的传说

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] the legend of the Three Witches of Winding Way.
translation.zh: ‎那我来讲讲蜿蜒路镇三女巫的传说

translation.en: You know that legend is totally made up, right?
[in a ghostly voice] Who says?
What was that?
[Lucy] What was that?
Oh, you were so not supposed to see me.
What? Did you just… talk?
Oops.
Sorry to interrupt. [chuckles] Pay no attention.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉打扰了 ‎你们别管我 该干什么干什么去吧

translation.en: You, you go back to what you were… doing.
translation.zh: ‎你们别管我 该干什么干什么去吧

translation.en: What's with all the screaming? You're scaring me.
Wait. He has my necklace!
Eek! Bye.
Where did it go?
-Ew. -[Fink] Just forget I was ever here.
Why is it talking?
[whimpers] I am so not touching that thing.
No touching. Just…
Get my necklace back.
We have to find it.
Bless you.
Thanks.
-[Scout gasps] Found him! -[yelps]
-Corner him! -Ha! Trapped like a rat.
That is my mom's necklace.
-[Willa] Drop it. -[fizzling]
-Oh, no. Uh-oh. That's not right. -[mystical music plays]
translation.zh: ‎哦 糟糕 ‎这不对啊 项链已经掉下来了！

translation.en: I dropped it already. I dropped it.
translation.zh: ‎这不对啊 项链已经掉下来了！

translation.en: What is happening?
Willa!
Stop, broom.
[yells] Stop!
What was that?
I have no idea.
Terrifying is what it was.
[groaning] Look out!
I gotta get out of here.
-[laughs] See ya later, kids. -No!
-[grunting] -Gotcha.
Nothing? How about this? [growls]
Nope, nope, nope.
-Come on, let me out! -Let's hide.
You give me back my necklace, I'll give you back your freedom.
translation.zh: ‎你把项链还我 我就还你自由

translation.en: Uh, look, I wish I could, but it's a long story. Trust me.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我倒是想还给你 ‎可是 这事说来话长 相信我

translation.en: Then you'll have to stay in this jar forever,
translation.zh: ‎那你就得永远待在这个罐子里

translation.en: and soon, you'll get really hungry.
-[Willa] So, do we have a deal? -[groaning] Oh, alright, you got a deal.
-Who are you anyway? -[mumbles through sealed lips]
Fine. Don't tell me.
But you're lucky I love animals,
translation.zh: ‎算你走运 我是个关爱动物的人

translation.en: or tonight wouldn't have ended so well for you.
translation.zh: ‎否则今晚你不会落得好下场

translation.en: Oh, Willa. [chuckles] You're just like your mom. Heart of gold.
translation.zh: ‎薇拉 ‎你就像你妈妈一样纯美善良

translation.en: Wait, did you just say I'm just like… my mom?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你刚才说我跟我妈妈一样吗？

translation.en: Fink, what's taking so long?
translation.zh: ‎芬克 你怎么去了这么久？

translation.en: Gotta go, Willa. Uh, I mean, uh, whoever you are. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我得走了 薇拉！ ‎不对 我并不认识你啦

translation.en: What do you know about my mom? And how do you know my name?
translation.zh: ‎你对我妈妈了解多少？ ‎你又是怎么知道我的名字的？

translation.en: Is it safe?
Where did my mom get this?
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈是从哪里弄来的这个呢？

translation.en: Where is he?
-I'm here, I'm here, I'm here. -[screaming]
Finally! [groans]
First, the good news: we've definitely found the necklace.
translation.zh: ‎先说个好消息 ‎项链我们肯定是找到了

translation.en: -Amazing work, Fink. -Great work.
The moldiest cheese for your dinner tonight.
translation.zh: ‎今晚你能吃到发霉发得最厉害的奶酪

translation.en: I was starting to think we couldn't count on you, but you proved me wrong.
translation.zh: ‎我本来都觉得指望不上你了 ‎结果你用行动证明了自己！

translation.en: You sure did, you little rat-Fink,
translation.zh: ‎没错 你这个可恶的小老鼠

translation.en: stinky-eyed, poop-breath, nonsensical, cat-fish whispering nightmare of a rat!
translation.zh: ‎贼眉鼠眼、满口屎臭、没头没脑 ‎只会逗猫和鱼玩儿的噩梦般的老鼠

translation.en: Hand it over.
Uh, you might want to save the compliments for after the bad news,
translation.zh: ‎你先别急着夸我 我还没说坏消息呢

translation.en: w-w-which is, um… [clears throat]
She has it.
Okay, you know all those compliments I just gave you? I take them all back.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我刚才的那串赞美连珠炮 ‎我全都收回来！

translation.en: She?
-No. -You don't mean--
Yep. Willa Ward has the necklace.
translation.zh: ‎没错 项链在薇拉沃德手里

translation.en: [exhales] I just had the craziest dream.
I don't think it was a dream.
You mean, you actually rode a broomstick?
And there's actually a talking rat?
Are we actually losing our minds?
[mimicking TV presenter] Today, schoolgirls fly on brooms,
translation.zh: ‎今天的节目中 女学童骑着扫帚飞翔

translation.en: and confide in talking, jewelry-stealing rats
translation.zh: ‎还向一只偷珠宝的会说话的老鼠倾诉

translation.en: on a very special episode of
Adventures of a Middle Schooler Gone Mad.
Definitely not your everyday necklace.
What isn't your dad telling you?
Let's go find out. [exhales]
[raps] ♪ P-P-Porridge Porridge Willa-Worridge ♪
♪ Come and get your special oatmeal ♪
Dad, you'll never believe what happened last night.
translation.zh: ‎爸爸 昨晚发生了特别离奇的事

translation.en: I woke up and a talking rat had my necklace.
translation.zh:
‎我醒来发现
‎一只会说话的老鼠偷了我的项链

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -Did you hear her say talking rat?
translation.zh: ‎你听到她说“会说话的老鼠”了吗？

translation.en: We were chasing it with brooms, and out of the blue,
translation.zh: ‎我们用扫帚追赶它 ‎然后突然扫帚开始四处乱飞！

translation.en: the brooms started flying everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎然后突然扫帚开始四处乱飞！

translation.en: No way!
Flying brooms and talking rats. What a night. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎会飞的扫帚和会说话的老鼠 ‎真是个奇妙的夜晚！

translation.en: Yeah. Willa flew right out the window.
translation.zh: ‎对 薇拉直接从窗户飞出去了

translation.en: And the rat said I look like Mom.
Well, they're not wrong there. Beautiful inside and out.
translation.zh: ‎那倒是没错 内在外在都很美

translation.en: You know, maybe I should speak with this talking rat that knew your mom.
translation.zh:
‎也许我应该跟这只
‎认识你妈妈的会说话的老鼠聊聊

translation.en: We could swap stories.
Isn't that crazy?
Crazy, man!
You don't believe us, do you?
I believe that too much candy and spooky stories make for wacky dreams.
translation.zh:
‎我认为吃太多糖果和听恐怖故事
‎会让人做荒唐的梦

translation.en: I ate five chocolate bars before bed once, and I woke up
translation.zh: ‎有一次我睡前吃了五根巧克力棒 ‎醒来后 我坚信我骑着河马飞越月球

translation.en: convinced that I rode a hippopotamus across the moon
translation.zh: ‎醒来后 我坚信我骑着河马飞越月球

translation.en: to meet the marshmallow queen
so we could eat a rocket ship made out of Jell-O
and then play tic-tac-toe.
-Dad. -[dad] Yeah?
This really happened.
Hey, could you guys get me one of those flying brooms?
translation.zh: ‎你们能给我一把飞天扫帚吗？

translation.en: Could help me clean up the shop better. Alright. Dig in.
translation.zh: ‎可以帮我清理店铺 ‎好了 吃饭吧

translation.en: -[sighing] -[dad] Speaking of cleaning up…
-[suspenseful music plays] -Nothing like my necklace anywhere. Hm.
translation.zh: ‎我找不到和我的类似的项链

translation.en: Should we try that weird bookstore with all the crystals and stuff?
translation.zh:
‎我们要不要去那家
‎有各种水晶的奇怪书店？

translation.en: -Good idea. -[phone chimes]
-Oh shoot. I'm late. -[Lucy] To be continued?
translation.zh: ‎糟了 我要迟到了！ ‎下次继续？

translation.en: We'll get to the bottom of it. Until then, just don't touch any brooms?
translation.zh: ‎我们会查清楚的 ‎在那之前 别碰任何扫帚？

translation.en: -Bye. -[Scout] Bye.
We only have one month left till Halloween.
Oh, what are you doing reading that book?
I had a brainwave. What if we had a summon-the-necklace spell?
translation.zh: ‎我有个主意 ‎万一我们有召唤项链的魔咒呢？

translation.en: Uh, we probably would have used it already if we did.
translation.zh: ‎要是有的话 我们早就用了吧

translation.en: I'm just thinking out loud.
Still gonna look.
Okay, will everyone please just stop talking
translation.zh: ‎好了 我求你们了！ ‎嘴巴消停一下 让我冷静思考行吗？

translation.en: [high-pitched] for one minute so I can hear myself think?
translation.zh: ‎嘴巴消停一下 让我冷静思考行吗？

translation.en: Thank you very much.
[regular voice] I need to concentrate. We need a plan.
translation.zh: ‎我需要集中精神 我们需要一个计划

translation.en: I suggest a potion to turn the girl into a baby bunny.
translation.zh: ‎我建议用魔药把那女孩变成小兔宝宝

translation.en: Stupid.
Then Claw could go catch her and bring her up here.
translation.zh: ‎克劳可以去抓她 把她带到这里来

translation.en: First we mix the fingernails of a rabid mountain squirrel with the--
translation.zh: ‎首先把一只发狂的山松鼠的指甲混…

translation.en: Why don't we just invite her for tea? Who doesn't like tea?
translation.zh: ‎不如我们邀请她来喝茶吧？ ‎谁不喜欢喝茶呢？

translation.en: -[blows raspberry] -Um, 12-year-old girls.
You might want to try a soda, a juice box, mocha frappuccino…
translation.zh: ‎你应该试试汽水、果汁、摩卡星冰乐

translation.en: [Fink] I mean, hello!
How should I know? I detest children. They make me break out in hives.
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道？我讨厌孩子 ‎他们让我浑身起荨麻疹

translation.en: Yeah, right? It's like… [shudders]
Alright, let's go with the dumb tea party idea.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 就办个愚蠢的茶会吧

translation.en: -Yay. [gasps] What should we wear? -[meows, hisses]
I don't know. Something gross?
Cat amulets… No…
[sighing] Nothing.
Maybe in here.
[sighing] Zilch.
-Mom? -[soft music plays]
This is a real mystery. [sighs]
Special delivery for Miss Willa Ward.
Another talking animal?
-How do you know who I am? -[tense music plays]
-Wow. -[soft music plays]
"Dear Willa Ward. We've just moved back in town after being away for some time."
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的薇拉沃德 ‎我们离开了一段时间 刚刚搬回来

translation.en: "We knew your mother well,
and would love to tell you all about her and her magical necklace."
translation.zh: ‎非常愿意告诉你她的故事 ‎以及她的奇妙项链

translation.en: "Please join us after school for tea and treats."
translation.zh: ‎请在放学后和我们一起喝茶吃点心

translation.en: "With love, Wanda and Wilma."
"P.S. We live in the old house at the top of the hill…"
translation.zh: ‎又及 我们住在山顶的那间老房子里”

translation.en: Oh, good morning, Kingsley Jenkins. Nice to see your face.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 金斯利詹金斯 很高兴看到你

translation.en: Oh! Good morning, Willa Ward. Welcome to class.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 薇拉沃德 ‎欢迎来到教室 展开新一天的冒险

translation.en: -A new day of adventure. [gasps] -[Willa] Morning, Ms. Juniper.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到教室 展开新一天的冒险 ‎早安 朱尼珀老师

translation.en: May I ask…
[softly] Where did you get that necklace?
Why?
Oh, no reason exactly. [chuckling] Just curious.
It was my mom's.
Great! Good chat.
Okay.
Nice necklace!
You getting ready for Halloween?
Going as…
a fashion disaster?
[girl] Oh, wait.
I guess that wouldn't be a costume.
translation.zh: ‎你不用特别打扮就已经是了

translation.en: Since jealousy is actually a compliment, Blaine, I'm simply going to say thank you.
translation.zh: ‎既然嫉妒其实是一种夸赞 布莱恩 ‎我就说一声谢谢

translation.en: I love it too!
[Willa] Secret stair spot.
Meeting at lunch. Super important.
[sighs] Where is it?
[Willa] "Please join us after school for tea and treats."
translation.zh: ‎“请在放学后和我们一起喝茶吃点心

translation.en: "With love, Wanda and Wilma."
-What? -[Lucy] What?
I know. What?
Are you going?
Of course she is. You're going, right?
Of course I am. They said they know about my mom, and this necklace.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 ‎她们说知道我妈妈的事 ‎还有这条项链

translation.en: You're brave to go up there alone. You know, I would never go up there.
translation.zh: ‎你敢一个人去真勇敢 ‎反正我肯定不敢去

translation.en: You do know the stories, right?
-That's why I'm not going alone. -Who are you going with?
translation.zh: ‎所以我才不会一个人去 ‎那你要跟谁去？

translation.en: I'll pack some snacks. Nothing too sugary. The last 24 hours have been weird enough.
translation.zh: ‎我去装点零食 甜的东西就不拿了 ‎过去的24小时已经够奇怪了

translation.en: Definitely.
Remember, I have to be home by dinner to babysit Sawyer.
translation.zh: ‎我得在晚饭前回家照顾索耶

translation.en: It shouldn't take too long. It's just tea, right?
translation.zh: ‎应该不会太久 就是喝个茶 对吧？

translation.en: Come on, let's do this.
[boy] Do what?
-[Willa] Nothing. -Nobody.
Hey, Wyatt.
You guys up to something exciting?
No. [sighing] Totally boring.
Boring.
Speak for yourself, Lucy. I'd call it intriguing.
translation.zh: ‎那是你觉得 露西 我觉得这很有趣

translation.en: -I mean-- -Be quiet.
Yep. Boring. So boring.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 对 很无聊 ‎超级无聊

translation.en: Ugh, bummer. I was looking for something fun to do after school today.
translation.zh: ‎真可惜 我本来想放学后找点乐子呢

translation.en: See ya.
A talking crow is so not boring.
Hey, Willa. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 薇拉 你怎么来了？

translation.en: Hey, Dad. Just wanted to let you know I'm going to be late today.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 爸爸 我今天要晚回家一个小时

translation.en: -I'm going to tea with, um, uh-- -Oh, okay, Willa. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我要去喝茶 和… ‎好的 薇拉

translation.en: Hey, little guy. I'll see you at dinner, right?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小家伙！ ‎那晚餐时见 好吧？

translation.en: -[Willa] Okay, bye. -Don't worry, they're just eyeballs.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 再见
‎-没关系 ‎别担心 就是眼球形状的糖果而已

translation.en: Ready?
Why are we taking the spookiest possible route to get there?
translation.zh: ‎我们为什么要走这条最诡异的路线？

translation.en: You know, the legend says these woods are the Haunted Hills,
translation.zh: ‎传说中 这个树林叫做闹鬼山丘

translation.en: cursed by the three witches of Winding Way themselves.
translation.zh: ‎被蜿蜒路镇的三女巫亲自下了诅咒

translation.en: I heard that witches have lived in that old house for centuries.
translation.zh:
‎我听说有女巫
‎在那个老房子里住了几个世纪

translation.en: Well, it's a good thing we're brave, right?
Come on. None of that is real.
translation.zh: ‎好了啦 那些故事都不是真的

translation.en: -Besides, this isn't that spooky. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎再说了 ‎-这也没有那么恐怖嘛
‎-是啊

translation.en: [Willa] They're probably just old ladies
who happen to live in a really creepy old house.
Just that right there sounded like the setup for a spooky movie.
translation.zh: ‎这听着完全就像恐怖电影的设置

translation.en: [hesitant] Yeah. What could go wrong?
Famous last words.
[Scout] Defs the beginning of a spooky movie.
Well, no time like the present.
-Hello? -[soft music plays]
Hello?
Is anyone home?
I hope you don't mind. I brought my friends.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你们不介意 ‎我带了两个朋友来

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Willa! So nice to see you again.
translation.zh: ‎薇拉 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: Again?
We knew you when you were just a baby.
translation.zh: ‎你还是个宝宝时我们就认识你了

translation.en: Oh, such a cute baby, with the skin, and the teeth, and the hairs, and things.
translation.zh: ‎多可爱的宝宝啊 你的皮肤以及 ‎牙齿 以及头发什么的

translation.en: [Wilma] And Lucy, Scout.
-Welcome. -[chuckles]
How did you know…?
Oh, just a simple seeing spell, nothing fancy.
translation.zh: ‎哦 就是个简单的识人魔咒 没什么的

translation.en: -Spell? -Ix-nay on the agic-may.
Please, sit down.
So, you knew my mom?
Oh! Knew her? [laughs]
Knew her? [laughs]
She was, uh, we were like…
That. We were best friends. We were just real close.
translation.zh: ‎我们是最好的朋友 我们很要好

translation.en: -You couldn't keep the three of us apart. -[Wanda laughs]
Well, until Neil-- [shrieks, laughs]
Until nothing. Until nothing. [strained laughter]
She was a real sweetheart, you know, heart of gold.
translation.zh: ‎她人可好了 特别纯美善良

translation.en: [laughs] Don't be shy.
[chuckling] Well, this isn't much of a tea party, is it?
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 这可算不上什么茶会 对吧？

translation.en: [laughs] Kidding. No, because there are no treats, and, um, no tea.
translation.zh: ‎开玩笑的 因为这里既没点心也没茶

translation.en: But I can change that, so I'm going to. Alright? [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎但我能改变这一点 我这就来 好吧？

translation.en: -[gasping] -Amazing.
What are you doing?
[strained] You know that children love candy, so just play along.
translation.zh: ‎你知道孩子们喜欢糖果的 ‎你就配合一下吧

translation.en: -What's happening? -Now what is happening? [laughs]
-[Wanda chuckles] -Isn't this fun?
So much-- [gags]
So much fun. [laughs]
Now Scout: what is your favorite treat in the whole wide world?
translation.zh: ‎丝考特 世上你最喜欢吃的是什么？

translation.en: Cotton candy.
Cotton candy. [gags]
Yum.
Edible chair? What? This might be the best day of my life.
translation.zh: ‎可以吃的椅子？天啊！ ‎这可能是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: Lucy, what would you like to have at tea for three?
translation.zh: ‎露西 ‎在这三人茶会上 你想来点什么？

translation.en: Well, I've always dreamed of it raining chocolate.
translation.zh: ‎这个嘛 ‎我一直梦想着下巧克力雨

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Wanda] Oh, no.
-[Willa] Delicious! -[Lucy] Whoa!
Now Willa, what about you, my dear?
translation.zh: ‎那么薇拉 你呢 亲爱的？

translation.en: I want to know about my mom,
so maybe we could have more talk, less treats.
translation.zh: ‎所以 ‎也许我们可以多说点话 少吃点东西

translation.en: -Willa, are you crazy? -Speak for yourself.
translation.zh:
‎-薇拉 你是疯了吗？
‎-就你这么觉得！

translation.en: She's here. What are we waiting for?
translation.zh: ‎她都来了 我们还在等什么呢？

translation.en: Let's get that thing off her.
translation.zh: ‎我们快把项链从她身上拿下来

translation.en: Well, um, you know, maybe we should just give them a moment to enjoy the tea party,
translation.zh:
‎也许我们应该
‎给她们一点时间享受一下茶会

translation.en: for-for a moment.
Fink, Sneak, shut up!
Wait a second. That's that rat from last night.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 那是昨天晚上的那只老鼠！

translation.en: [gasps] Uh, I think we should go.
-No. -[ominous music plays]
[laughs] Let's cut to the chase, shall we?
translation.zh: ‎我们就直入主题吧 好吗？

translation.en: We want your necklace.
I know it would be nice for you to have it, but what good is it to you, really?
translation.zh: ‎我知道你戴着挺好的 ‎可你拿它有什么用呢？

translation.en: I mean, whereas to us, getting it back would be,
translation.zh: ‎而对我们来说 把它拿回来会…

translation.en: I don't know, Wilma, what would you say?
Like, um, magnificently splendorifically terrifical?
translation.zh: ‎就是美妙绝伦、精彩奇妙又奇幻？

translation.en: -Yes, I'd say exactly that. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: ‎是的 和我想的一模一样

translation.en: No. It was my mom's and she wanted me to have it.
translation.zh: ‎不行！ ‎这是我妈妈的 她想让我来保管

translation.en: You invited me here to tell me about her, and I haven't heard one thing.
translation.zh:
‎你们说要跟我讲她的事
‎可我一样也没听到

translation.en: So, we're leaving.
Uh, no you're not.
Sneak.
Aw, that's a shame, because there was an easy way to do this,
translation.zh: ‎真可惜啊 本来这件事可以简单解决

translation.en: and now, [laughs] what do you know, there's a hard way.
translation.zh: ‎可现在没办法 我们只好来硬的了

translation.en: I mean, we didn't want to have to play the witch card,
but you've kind of forced our hands.
translation.zh: ‎可你们非要逼得我们出绝招

translation.en: -[cackling] -Witches! [screams]
See? I told you those stories are true.
translation.zh: ‎你看 我就说那些故事是真的！

translation.en: You want to know something about your mom?
She was too trusting.
Just. Like. You.
-Over here! -[screaming]
-Oh, no. Um, here. Hide. -[Wanda] It's time! Witches coming for ya!
translation.zh:
‎-糟糕了
‎-站住！ ‎这里 躲起来！ ‎女巫来抓你们了！

translation.en: [Wilma, singsongy] We just want to talk to you.
[whimpers] They're coming.
[Willa] Hide. In here.
-[ominous music plays] -[singsongy] Girls! Where did you go?
-[cackling] -You can run, but you can't hide.
translation.zh: ‎你们跑得掉 但是躲不掉！

translation.en: This way.
Some kind of potion room.
I'm calling my mom. I don't care if I get grounded--
translation.zh: ‎我要打给我妈妈！哪怕我被禁足

translation.en: Forever. There's no signal.
Lucy, your face feels more bony than usual.
translation.zh: ‎露西 你的脸比平时更有骨感了

translation.en: -You're not touching my face, Scout. -Sure I am.
translation.zh: ‎你没有在碰我的脸 丝考特 ‎我明明就在啊

translation.en: That's your cheek, and now I'm sticking my finger into your eye--
translation.zh:
‎这是你的脸颊
‎现在我的手指戳进了你的眼睛

translation.en: [Scout] Into your eye?!
-[Wilma] Oh, girls? -[gasps] Oh no.
[screams] Find a potion!
-Do something! -[wails]
Nope. Upside down potion.
Flying potion.
Hiding potion! Aha!
Here.
"When ye wish to hide From the troubles on the outside
Drink this potion with open mind And ye shall be the… feline kind?"
translation.zh: ‎就用开放的心态喝下魔药 ‎然后你就会变成猫”？

translation.en: Wait. Does that mean…?
-[tinkling] -Oh no.
-You're-- -I have paws.
Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
And a tail!
[Wilma] Yoo-hoo! Girls.
Run!
Run? I have to learn to walk with four legs before I can run!
translation.zh: ‎跑？我得先学会怎么用四条腿走路

translation.en: [Wanda] I won't let them get away.
-[Wanda] Where did they get to now? -[Wilma] Sure are slimy little things.
translation.zh: ‎她们在哪里？ ‎她们真是狡猾难缠的小东西

translation.en: -[Willa] Quick. Under here. -[dramatic music plays]
I've looked everywhere. They're gone.
translation.zh: ‎我到处都找过了 她们不见了

translation.en: And I looked everywhere you looked right after you did,
translation.zh: ‎你找过的地方我也跟着找了一遍

translation.en: just to be sure.
You know how cats can fit into the smallest places?
translation.zh: ‎你知道猫可以钻进很窄的空间吧？

translation.en: You want us to go in there? Look at the size of that spider.
translation.zh: ‎你要我们钻进去吗？ ‎那儿有那么大的蜘蛛呢！

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll stay here and meet my fate, thank you very much.
translation.zh: ‎那儿有那么大的蜘蛛呢！ ‎我就待在这里听天由命了 谢谢

translation.en: [Willa] Shoo, you big, hairy spider.
translation.zh: ‎走开 你这个毛毛的大蜘蛛

translation.en: We're coming in.
[Scout] Come on, Lucy. We don't have time to be scared.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 露西 我们没时间害怕

translation.en: [witches scream] Where are they?
[gasps] A tail.
A tail. [gasps] That means they've gotten into the hiding potion.
translation.zh:
‎-尾巴
‎-尾巴 ‎那说明她们喝了躲藏魔药

translation.en: -[gasps] -We need to go outside! We need Claw!
translation.zh: ‎我们得出去 我们需要克劳

translation.en: -Claw! -Claw!
[Willa] We have to keep moving. We cannot be scaredy cats.
translation.zh: ‎我们得一直往前走 ‎我们不能当胆小猫

translation.en: I am a scaredy cat, though.
Claw!
-Oh, hey! How's the party going? -They snuck out in the drain.
translation.zh: ‎嘿！茶会进展得怎样了？ ‎她们躲进了下水道

translation.en: Let us know immediately if you see them, okay?
translation.zh: ‎如果你看到她们 马上告诉我们

translation.en: -Uh… sure? -Do not let them get away.
As the crow flies, they can't have gone far.
translation.zh: ‎按直线距离算 她们应该走不远

translation.en: You're a crow, so you should know. Okay, stop looking at me.
translation.zh: ‎你是乌鸦 所以你应该清楚 ‎好了 别再看着我了

translation.en: -[caws] -Fly!
-Yes. Wilma? -Yes?
Warm up the cauldron.
Now?
Yes, Wilma, now.
Cat respect meter just went way up.
That was so claustrophobic.
translation.zh: ‎我刚才都快得幽闭恐惧症了

translation.en: And filthy. Ew.
-[dramatic music plays] -Here, kitties, kitties, kitties!
Well, I spy with my little crow eye… [caws]
It's that creepy crow!
Shoo! Go away! Leave us alone!
[caws] Not until you hand over the amulet.
Run!
-[bubbling] -[Wanda] Yes, yes, yes…
Oh yes, oh yes!
Claw's got them. Wilma! Claw's got them!
translation.zh: ‎克劳抓到她们了 威尔玛！ ‎克劳抓到她们了

translation.en: We got 'em!
Fog and bog and city smog And nice little families out for a jog
translation.zh: ‎雾、沼泽和城市的尘霾 ‎在外慢跑的可爱小家庭

translation.en: Envelop the children who are now cats And, oh, they'll be scared like, like rats
translation.zh: ‎快包围那变成猫的孩子们吧 ‎她们会吓得像一只老鼠 好吧？

translation.en: [high-pitched] Meow! It's foggy, I can't see.
[normal voice] It's really working, Wilma, it's working!
translation.zh: ‎我的魔咒起效了 威尔玛 起效了

translation.en: [Willa] What is this place?
Super creepy, that's what.
In case we don't make it back, I just want to say
translation.zh: ‎万一我们回不去了 我只想说

translation.en: that I was 100% right about the witches this whole time.
translation.zh: ‎我百分之百预测对了她们是女巫！

translation.en: Where's all this fog coming from?
I can't see my paws in front of my face!
This is so not fun anymore.
Honestly, it really hasn't been fun since the candy part,
translation.zh: ‎老实说 ‎打从糖果那部分开始就不好玩了

translation.en: and even that felt a tad unsanitary.
translation.zh: ‎就连那个我也觉得有点不卫生

translation.en: -[dramatic music plays] -Hello, girls.
Nice work, Claw.
An extra portion of kitten stew just for you!
translation.zh: ‎我会专门为你多加一份猫咪炖汤

translation.en: Aha! Hello, kitten stew. [caws]
One thing you three might have overlooked.
translation.zh: ‎你们三个可能忽略了一件事

translation.en: [Wilma] Witches love eating cat stew!
Especially on a stormy night.
Eat someone else then, because we're out of here.
translation.zh: ‎你们去吃别人吧 我们得走了

translation.en: -[Willa] Run! -[Lucy] I am not a snack.
[groans] I forgot how slippery cats are.
But not how tasty.
-[Wilma] Whoo! -[Wanda] You go that way.
-[Wilma exhales, clicks tongue] -Oh, no. Oh, no. Oh, no.
[sighs] Where could they be?
Don't move a whisker.
Oh, no, guys. I have to…
translation.zh: ‎不行 各位 我忍不住要…

translation.en: -Please don't sneeze. -[Lucy makes pre-sneeze noises]
-[pre-sneeze noises] -[Willa] Please, please hold it in.
[Willa] Hold it in.
-Bless you. -Thanks.
-We need to get out of here. -Now's our chance.
translation.zh: ‎我们得离开这里 就趁现在

translation.en: Lucy, wait!
[cackles] Boo.
Not so fast this time.
Now the hiding's said and done Return the form that they came from
translation.zh: ‎她们的躲藏已完毕 ‎现在让她们现原形！

translation.en: We're human again. We're human!
translation.zh: ‎我们又变成人类了！ ‎我们是人类！

translation.en: -Hey, hi. -Yes! Still dangerous witches, not so happy.
translation.zh:
‎喂 危险的女巫还在这儿呢
‎别这么开心

translation.en: Looks like you girls have been rooted out.
And it's going to be a lot harder for you to escape
translation.zh: ‎现在你们可没那么容易逃脱了

translation.en: now that you're just "pesky little girls" and not cats.
translation.zh:
‎你们现在只是“讨厌的小女孩”
‎而不是猫了

translation.en: Oh, I have an idea. Why don't we call this whole thing off,
translation.zh: ‎我有个主意 不如我们少废话

translation.en: and you just, I don't know, hand over the necklace.
translation.zh: ‎你们就 那什么 把项链交出来吧

translation.en: Just grab it.
You know as well as I do, it needs to be given, not taken.
translation.zh:
‎你和我一样清楚
‎这东西只能被给予 不能强抢

translation.en: Well, in that case, hand over the amulet. Now!
translation.zh: ‎那样的话 把护身符交出来 ‎就现在！

translation.en: No!
My mom would never want it in the hands of you bad witches.
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈绝不会
‎让你们这些坏女巫拿到它

translation.en: -I'm gonna get my dad and he'll-- -[laughing]
translation.zh: ‎我这就去找我爸爸 他会…

translation.en: Did you hear that, Wilma? She's going to get "Neil" to come help.
translation.zh: ‎你听到了吗 威尔玛？ ‎她打算叫尼尔来帮忙

translation.en: -[Wanda] Neil! -[laughing]
My mom was right. Chocolate alleviates stress.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈说得对 巧克力可以减轻压力

translation.en: Good thing I loaded up at the tea party.
Seriously? You're eating candy right now?
translation.zh: ‎你有没有搞错？你现在还在吃糖果？

translation.en: Candy? [gags]
The candy!
They can't stand candy. Literally!
Take that!
Let's get out of here, fast.
-Ooh! Oh no. Burning! -[Wilma whimpers, yelps]
-[screams] Stop! -[dramatic music plays]
We made it.
-[Scout] Oh my goodness. -Hey! Alright, I got a signal!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 ‎嘿！ ‎好了 我有信号了

translation.en: Oh, good.
Okay, I am so grounded.
So much for those stories being made up, huh, Scout?
translation.zh:
‎你这下不会说
‎那些故事是编的了吧 丝考特？

translation.en: I mean, no 11-year-old really believes in witches.
translation.zh:
‎不是我说
‎没哪个11岁的孩子真的相信女巫

translation.en: How was I supposed to know?
I have a feeling that's not the last we'll be seeing of those two. [sighs]
translation.zh:
‎我感觉这不会是
‎我们最后一次见到她们

translation.en: As scary as tonight was, it was also pretty cool to be a cat.
translation.zh: ‎虽然今晚很可怕 ‎但当一只猫还挺酷的

translation.en: -[soft music plays] -Think we can do it again? [in unison] Seriously?
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得我们可以再来一次吗？
‎-你没搞错吧？

translation.en: -Too soon? -[in unison] Yes!
And there's no way I'm going back into that house to get more potion. Except…
translation.zh: ‎我也绝不会回到那里去拿更多的魔药 ‎除非

translation.en: Wait a second. I forgot to put it back on the shelf.
translation.zh: ‎等一下 ‎我忘记把它放回架子上了

translation.en: I think seventh grade just got a lot more interesting.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉七年级突然变得有趣得多了

translation.en: Hey, guys? Thanks for being such great friends today and sticking by me.
translation.zh: ‎对了 谢谢你们这么有义气地帮助我

translation.en: You guys are like the sisters I never had. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我们不是亲姐妹 但胜似亲姐妹

translation.en: [in a spooky voice] The Sisters of Winding Way! Whoo…
-[laughing] -Wisters!
The Wisters of Winding Way! [laughing]
-The Wisters! -[Willa] Come on.
Heyo.
Dad!
What would you say if I told you I got chased by witches today
translation.zh: ‎如果我告诉你我今天被女巫追

translation.en: and turned into a cat?
translation.zh: ‎还变成了猫 你会说什么？

translation.en: [inhales] Well I would say, sweetheart,
you don't have to make up stories to get my attention.
translation.zh: ‎你不必编故事来吸引我的注意

translation.en: You always have my attention.
translation.zh: ‎我的注意力一直在你身上呢

translation.en: Thought it would be something like that.
-[soft music plays] -Do you know where Mom got this?
translation.zh: ‎你知道妈妈的项链是怎么来的吗？

translation.en: No. She just always had it, ever since I knew her.
translation.zh: ‎不 我认识她时她就一直戴着它

translation.en: She used to say she was a different person before she and I met and we had you.
translation.zh:
‎她总说她认识我和生下你之前
‎她是个完全不同的人

translation.en: Maybe she got it from one of the [spooky voice] witches of Winding Way.
translation.zh:
‎也许那是她
‎从蜿蜒路镇的某个女巫那里得到的

translation.en: Bedtime.
You want the lights on or off?
On.
Okay. Love you, kiddo.
What?
"Dear Willa."
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的薇拉 如果你在读这个

translation.en: "If you're reading this, that means you have my necklace,
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的薇拉 如果你在读这个 ‎就说明你拿到了我的项链

translation.en: and I think you're probably wondering if I was a witch."
translation.zh: ‎我想你可能在想我是不是个女巫

translation.en: "I was."
[Willow] I was a witch, Willa.
[sighs] And if I know my curious…
pure-hearted, beautiful baby girl…
translation.zh: ‎心地纯净又美丽的宝贝女儿

translation.en: …I know what you're thinking. [exhales]
"How could my mom be a witch, and does this make me a witch too?"
translation.zh: ‎“我妈妈怎么可能是女巫？ ‎那我也是个女巫吗？”

translation.en: Just because you are mine…
"…doesn't make you a witch."
"Believing in magic does, and you can be a witch."
translation.zh: ‎关键是你要相信魔法 ‎那你就能成为女巫”

translation.en: A good witch,
if you choose to believe in the values of courage,
translation.zh: ‎如果你选择相信好的价值观 ‎勇气

translation.en: kindness, and wisdom.
"Magic can be used for bad things,
but it can also be used for very, very good things."
translation.zh: ‎但也可以用来做非常好的事情”

translation.en: You taught me that, Willa.
And now that you have my necklace, you have that choice.
translation.zh: ‎现在你有了我的项链 ‎你就有了向善的选择

translation.en: There is something very important you must do, though.
translation.zh: ‎但你有一件很重要的事要做

translation.en: "In order to harness the power of the amulet,
and keep yourself safe…"
…you will need my secret witch book.
I hid it for you in case this day ever came.
translation.zh: ‎我把它藏了起来 以备这一天的到来

translation.en: There will be obstacles along the way to finding it…
translation.zh: ‎你在寻找它的过程中会遇到阻碍

translation.en: "…to make sure it ends up in the right hands."
translation.zh: ‎“以确保它会落入对的人的手中”

translation.en: Your hands. [sighs]
I love you…
with all that I am.
"And I am always with you."
Closer than you know.
[crying] "Take good care of Dad."
[voice breaking] You are my heart.
"Mom."
